stem_md: 58-year-old man with crushing chest pain and inferior ST elevations.
explanation_brief_md: Aspirin should be administered as soon as STEMI is suspected.
explanation_deep_md: Guidelines recommend non-enteric chewed aspirin before catheterization.
alt_text: Inferior STEMI angiography and anatomy diagram.

stem_md: Toddler with tetralogy of Fallot becomes cyanotic while crying.
lead_in: What is the next best step?
choiceC: Place in knee-chest position and give propranolol
explanation_brief_md: Knee-chest positioning with beta blockade relieves hypercyanotic spells.
explanation_deep_md: Propranolol reduces infundibular spasm while increasing SVR.
alt_text: Phonocardiogram of a harsh crescendo-decrescendo murmur.
